name: Go with the Flow (jeroenpx)
description:
Octopus is not the most active swimmer. You may need to give him a helping hand to cross the levels.

"Go with the Flow" is a game made back in 2017 in a weekend with a group of 3 people: Bart Huylebroeck, WietseVB and me.

Controls: drag anywhere in the water to control the flow. It doesn't have to be anywhere near the octopus.
